name: claude-usage-monitor
description: Shows Claude subscription usage limits (5-hour and 7-day windows) as percentages in the VS Code status bar

claudeUsage.refreshIntervalMinutes.description: How often (in minutes) to refresh usage data from the Anthropic API.

claudeUsage.manualToken.markdownDescription: Override the auto-detected OAuth token. Leave empty to auto-read from `~/.claude/.credentials.json`. Accepts an OAuth bearer token from Claude Code.

claudeUsage.statusBarPosition.description: Which side of the status bar to place the usage item.

claudeUsage.statusBarPriority.description: Priority of the status bar item. Higher values appear further left within the chosen side.

claudeUsage.showModelBreakdown.description: Show per-model (Opus/Sonnet) breakdown in the status bar tooltip.

claudeUsage.notifyAtThreshold.description: Show a warning notification when any usage window reaches this fraction (0.0â€“1.0). Set to 1.0 to disable.
